list.title: Skills Library
list.emptyDescription: Create your first skill or import one to get started
list.githubTokenHint: Set a GITHUB_TOKEN to check for skill updates from GitHub and avoid API rate limits.

find.title: Find Skills
find.emptyDescription: Search for community-built skills, discuss results, and install them directly into your workspace.
find.inputPlaceholder: Describe the skill you're looking for...

versions.title: Version History
versions.switchDescription: This will update the skill to use this version's files.
versions.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete this version and its files. This action cannot be undone.

files.title: Skill Files
files.filePathHelp: Include folder path to create files in subdirectories (e.g. scripts/utils.py)
files.createFileExists: A file with this path already exists
files.blockedFileType: File type {{ext}} is not allowed (compiled artifact)
files.skillMdReserved: SKILL.md is managed separately and cannot be created as a resource file
files.noResources: No resources available. Create a version first.

create.title: Create New Skill
create.subtitle: Describe what you need—AI builds the rest
create.name: Skill Name
create.nameHelp: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only (e.g., "paper-to-poster")
create.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
create.nameTooLong: Name must be at most 128 characters
create.nameInvalid: Name must be lowercase, alphanumeric, and hyphen-separated
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what you want this skill to accomplish...
create.descriptionHelp: Be specific about the task or goal. AI will generate the skill based on your description.
create.skillTypeHelp: User skills appear in Agent chat. Meta skills are internal utilities.
create.tagsHelp: Comma-separated tags for categorization (e.g., "nlp, document, conversion")
create.aiGenerating: AI agent is generating your skill...
create.creationTime: This may take 3-5 minutes. The AI agent is reading skill-creator documentation and generating appropriate content.
create.whatHappensDescription: When you click "Create Skill", an AI agent will:
create.step3: Generate appropriate SKILL.md content based on your description
create.step4: Create scripts/ and references/ if needed
create.processTime: This process takes 3-5 minutes as the AI analyzes your requirements.

delete.title: Delete Skill
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. All versions and associated data will be permanently deleted.

import.title: Import Skill
import.dropzone: Drop .skill or .zip file here, or click to browse
import.dropzoneFolder: Or drag and drop a folder
import.conflict: A skill with this name already exists

evolve.title: Evolve Skills & Agents
evolve.description: Improve skills and agent system prompts based on traces and feedback
evolve.targetsHint: Select at least one skill or agent
evolve.feedbackSourcesHint: Provide at least one trace or text feedback
evolve.tracesHelp: Choose execution traces to analyze for improvements
evolve.noTraces: No execution traces found. You can still evolve using text feedback below.
evolve.guidePlaceholder: Reply to the agent, approve the plan, or provide more guidance...
evolve.agentNotFound: agent-skill-evolver agent not found. Please restart the backend to seed it.

sync.title: Filesystem Sync
sync.description: The skill files have been modified outside the application.

unregistered.title: Unregistered Skills Found
unregistered.description: {{count}} skill found on disk but not registered in the database
unregistered.description_other: {{count}} skills found on disk but not registered in the database

updateFromSource.title: Update Version
updateFromSource.description: Create a new version of "{{name}}" from an external source
updateFromSource.invalidGithubUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub URL (e.g., https://github.com/owner/repo)
updateFromSource.dropFile: Drop .skill or .zip file here, or click to browse
updateFromSource.dropFolder: Drop a folder here, or click to browse
updateFromSource.dropFolderOnly: Please drop a folder, not a file
updateFromSource.noChanges: No changes detected. Skill is already up to date.

newVersion.title: Create New Version
newVersion.subtitle: Add a new version for
newVersion.skillMdDescription: The main skill documentation in Markdown format with YAML frontmatter.
newVersion.schemaDescription: JSON Schema for input/output validation. Optional.
newVersion.manifestDescription: Package metadata including dependencies and triggers. Optional.

validation.versionInvalid: Version must be a valid SemVer (e.g., 1.0.0, 1.0.0-beta.1)

seedDescriptions.skill-creator: Guide for creating effective skills that extend agent capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.
seedDescriptions.skill-evolver: Analyze skill execution traces to identify issues and automatically evolve/improve skills based on real execution data.
seedDescriptions.skill-updater: Update existing skills based on user feedback about what needs to change or improve.
seedDescriptions.mcp-builder: Guide for creating MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services through well-designed tools.
seedDescriptions.skill-finder: Discover and install agent skills from the open ecosystem. Search community skills by keyword and install them directly.
seedDescriptions.skills-planner: Plan which skills are needed to fulfill user requirements. Recommends existing skills, identifies new skills to create, and composes system prompts.
seedDescriptions.trace-qa: Analyze and answer questions about agent execution traces. Debug failed runs, understand agent behavior, and analyze token usage.
seedDescriptions.planning-with-files: Implements file-based planning for complex tasks. Creates task_plan.md, findings.md, and progress.md for multi-step projects.
seedDescriptions.pdf: Read, create, and review PDF files with rendering and layout support using reportlab, pdfplumber, and pypdf.
seedDescriptions.doc: Read, create, and edit .docx documents with formatting and layout fidelity using python-docx.
seedDescriptions.speech: Text-to-speech narration and voiceover generation via the OpenAI Audio API with built-in voices.
seedDescriptions.spreadsheet: Create, edit, analyze, and format spreadsheets (.xlsx, .csv, .tsv) using openpyxl and pandas.
seedDescriptions.sora: Generate, remix, and manage Sora videos via OpenAI's video API with the bundled CLI.
seedDescriptions.imagegen: Generate and edit images via the OpenAI Image API — generation, inpainting, background removal, product shots, and batch variants.
seedDescriptions.gemini-imagegen: Generate and edit images using Google Gemini's native image generation models. Supports text-to-image, image editing, and multi-image composition.
seedDescriptions.pubmed-database: Direct REST API access to PubMed. Advanced Boolean/MeSH queries, E-utilities API, batch processing, and citation management.
seedDescriptions.pdb-database: Access RCSB PDB for 3D protein/nucleic acid structures. Search, download coordinates, and retrieve metadata for structural biology.
seedDescriptions.rdkit: Cheminformatics toolkit for molecular control. SMILES/SDF parsing, descriptors, fingerprints, substructure search, and similarity analysis.
seedDescriptions.biopython: Comprehensive molecular biology toolkit. Sequence manipulation, file parsing, phylogenetics, and programmatic NCBI/PubMed access.
seedDescriptions.media-downloader: Download videos and audio from 1500+ websites including YouTube, Bilibili, TikTok, Twitter/X, and more using yt-dlp.
seedDescriptions.audio-extractor: Extract audio from videos and download audio-only content from 1500+ websites. Convert to MP3, FLAC, WAV, or OPUS.
seedDescriptions.remotion-best-practices: Best practices for Remotion — video creation in React.
seedDescriptions.humanizer: Remove signs of AI-generated writing from text. Detects and fixes patterns like inflated symbolism, promotional language, and AI vocabulary.
seedDescriptions.ai-writing-detection: Comprehensive AI writing detection patterns and methodology. Vocabulary lists, structural patterns, and model-specific fingerprints.
seedDescriptions.canvas-design: Create beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf documents using design philosophy. Posters, art, and original visual designs.
seedDescriptions.brand-identity: Create a complete brand visual identity system — logos, color palettes, typography, business cards, social media assets, and brand guidelines.
seedDescriptions.copywriting: Generate brand-aligned copy with precise constraints for every touchpoint — taglines, brand philosophy, social media bios, and manifestos.
seedDescriptions.code-to-diagram: Generate architecture diagrams, ER diagrams, sequence diagrams, flowcharts, and class diagrams from codebases using Mermaid.js.
seedDescriptions.markdown-to-storyboard: Convert markdown content into a structured storyboard CSV for slide decks, video scripts, or sequential visual media.
seedDescriptions.storyboard-to-slides: Assemble a PPTX slide deck from a storyboard CSV and images using python-pptx with multiple slide layouts and custom themes.
seedDescriptions.invoice-organizer: Automatically organize invoices and receipts for tax preparation. Read files, extract key info, rename consistently, and sort into logical folders with a summary CSV.
seedDescriptions.twitter-algorithm-optimizer: Analyze and optimize tweets for maximum reach using Twitter's open-source algorithm insights. Rewrite and edit tweets to improve engagement based on ranking signals.
seedDescriptions.slack-gif-creator: Toolkit for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack. Validators for size constraints, composable animation primitives, and helper utilities for message and emoji GIFs.
seedDescriptions.humanizer-zh: Remove AI-generated writing traces from Chinese text. Detects and fixes patterns like exaggerated symbolism, promotional language, shallow analysis, vague attribution, dash overuse, rule-of-three abuse, and AI vocabulary. Based on Wikipedia's 'Signs of AI writing' guide.
